response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us, reflecting its high-quality materials, innovative features, and unparalleled performance. Considering its unique benefits and the satisfaction it could bring to you, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $10,000. I believe this offer provides a great value for you while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 10000}
